Steps.Speaker: Ambrose
Steps.Text: Well, that was dreadfully impolite. A Magister's dockwatch lacks all sense of Minrathous hospitality.

Steps.Speaker: Dougal
Steps.Text: They're Venatori on a payroll, Ambrose. They ain't here to pour you wine.

Steps.Speaker: Guard
Steps.Text: Maker's breath... please! I yield! The Magister didn't pay us enough to die to a pair of alley rats!

Choices.Text: We don't leave loose ends. Finish him, Dougal.

Steps.Speaker: Dougal
Steps.Text: Pragmatic. I like it. No witnesses to warn the estate.

Choices.Text: Run along, friend. And reconsider your choice of employer.

Steps.Speaker: Guard
Steps.Text: Thank you! Thank you! You'll never see me again!

Steps.Speaker: Dougal
Steps.Text: You're a fool, Ambrose. A suave fool, but a fool. That rat's going to squeal.

Steps.Speaker: Ambrose
Steps.Text: Relax, Dougal. A little mercy buys us good karma. Now, let's hit the Magister's vault before sunrise.

Steps.Speaker: Ambrose
Steps.Text: A shame, but necessary. Now, let's relieve this Magister of his prized artifact before the sun comes up.
